**Example 1: 重装实例**

重装实例

Input: 

```
tccli ecm ResetInstances --cli-unfold-argument  \
    --InstanceIdSet ein-492054ga ein-482972ao \
    --ImageId img-q9fy0if9 \
    --Password hpjtfgnb3nwa
```

Output: 
```
{
    "Response": {
        "RequestId": "s46ofg79-6hm8-4b48-b3aa-djl3424-6jgfh"
    }
}
```
